snippet: “Duck Dynasty,” the A&E reality show about a Louisiana family that makes duck calls, is growing in popularity.
abstract: Popular A&E television series Duck Dynasty, which follows the Robertson family of Louisiana and their duck-call-making business, departs from most backwoods reality shows in its comparative wit and the variety and natural charisma of its characters.
lead_paragraph: “Duck Dynasty,” the A&E reality show about a Louisiana family that makes duck calls, is growing in popularity.

headline.seo: ‘Duck Dynasty’ Lures a Growing Audience on A&E
headline.main: Lured In by a Family Just Being Itself on TV
headline.print_headline: Lured In by a Family Just Being Itself on TV
